html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: Over the past two decades, Uganda's civil war has forced hundreds of thousands of families into miserable camps. Now, buoyed by recent peace talks, many are clustering into less-cramped "return camps."

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: Senior writer Roger Burks spent a night alongside displaced families in one of these makeshift villages, Ogonyo, where Mercy Corps is helping residents support themselves while they await the day they can return home.

content: Behind the Horn of Africa's Brewing Storm

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: Randy Martin, director of Global Emergency Operations, discusses the worsening conditions on the Kenya-Somalia border, where Mercy Corps is delivering critical supplies amid the growing concerns of a regional war.

html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td span a span

content: Mercy Corps is helping communities in tsunami-affected areas of Indonesia. Since December 2004, we've assisted more than 1 million survivors with innovative programmes designed to "build back better."

tag: html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td a span
html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td span a span
html body text div table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p span
content: We would like to introduce our new online shop, which features Christmas cards, decorations and calendars. Your holiday purchases help us fund critical projects in more than 35 countries around the world.
